Package org.netbeans.api.xml.parsers

XML processors API unification, OpenIDE bridging and utility classes.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DocumentInputSource
    Integrate NetBeans widely used Swing's Document with SAX API's.
    SAXEntityParser
    SAX parser wrapper allowing to parse parsed XML entities (including DTDs) for wellformedness.

Package org.netbeans.api.xml.parsers Description

XML processors API unification, OpenIDE bridging and utility classes.

XML Tools Parser APIs

Contrains simple standard XML processors API (DOM, SAX, TrAX) extensions (DTDParser) and classes for their APIs unification (ProcessorNotifier) and integration with OpenIDE (DocumentInputSource).
